results.name: Sum of divisors of n that have a square factor.
comment: Note that 1 does not have a square factor. - _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 20 2017
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
Index entries for sequences related to sums of divisors
mathematica: a[1]=0; a[n_] := DivisorSigma[1, n] - Times@@(1+FactorInteger[n][[;; , 1]]); Array[a,86] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Dec 20 2018 *)
results.author: _Joerg Arndt_, Jun 30 2009
